verbose_text: To reduce the adverse effects of the VEGF- or VEGFR targeting systemic therapy to non cancerous patients, an intravitreal injection of bevacizumab or ranibizumab is applied for the treatment of neovascular AMD.
evidence: reduce the adverse effects of the VEGF- or VEGFR-targeting systemic therapy to non-cancerous patients, an intravitreal injection of bevacizumab or ranibizumab is applied for the treatment of neovascular AMD
